data.name: Glitch Dungeon Crystal
data.detailed_description:
i remember... all those years ago, when I escaped that dungeon...

though i continued on with my life.. i always heard its siren call

hi so much

Glitch Dungeon Crystal: a weird glitch adventure coming 2022.


Explore a natural labyrinth where sprites, frogs, bugs, glitches, witches, and monsters make their home. Learn spells that "glitch" the mechanics of the game, and sweep away code and monsters with your trusty broom.

the HIGH PRIESTESS


lives in the tallest tower deep within the glitch dungeon.. studying ancient rites, awakening terrible glitchy monsters, all in a vain search for the GODDESS

mechanics


well, it's a platformer.. move and jump to climb stone towers, swim through swamps, dodge through trees, and become one with fabric of reality

glitch spells: utilize the magic of crystal obelisks..

  • walk in the air as if the FLOOR never left your feet!
  • jump and float safely as if you yourself were a FEATHER!
  • climb straight up walls as if they were LADDER!
  • move through monsters and glitches as if you were INVISIBLE!
  • and more...

items of power: exploring may find items of untold power..

  • a GRIMOIRE and SPELL BOOK PAGES to memorize and improve your glitchy magick..
  • a MAGIC BROOM which can sweep away glitchy monsters and provide you with another jump!
  • an ENCHANTED HAMMER which can create powerful armours and fashions
  • a BLOOD DAGGER which can be used to sacrifice your health to create save points!
  • and more...

Enter the dungeon and seek ultimate power!

#madewithgodot

data.short_description: hi so much. Explore an unnatural labyrinth where sprites, frogs, bugs, glitches, witches, and monsters make their home. Learn spells that "glitch" the mechanics of the game, and sweep away code and monsters with your trusty broom.
data.legal_notice:
attributions:
  • most tilesets/decor: Zaebucca
  • several NPC/enemy sprites: Carefree Media
  • music: markeryjane
  • glitch assets from: dataerase
  • water tiles & other objects from: mrmotarius miniadventures
  • kelp & environmental assets made with: mrmotarius mrmotext
  • coral, bubbles, and misc fishes from: rapidpunches megamarinepack
  • swamp houses made with: cyangmou pixel side-scroller churchyard tileset
  • part of the house interior tileset made with: s4m-ur4i huge pixelart asset pack
  • several SFX from: archizer 151 retro monsters sfx pack
  • fonts from: somepx more fonts and arcade vga typewriter

(other attributions will be updated as the game develops)

#MadeWithGodot
